import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { HiDocumentAdd } from "react-icons/hi"; import { MdDeleteForever } from "react-icons/md"; import { InvoiceDetails } from "./InvoiceDetails"; import "./invoice.styles.css"; export const InvoiceNew = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState([]); const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); const [dealer, setDealer] = useState(false); const addItem = () => { setItems([...items, 1]); grandTotal(); }; const grandTotal = () => { const gavno = document.getElementsByClassName("total-price"); const newTotal = Array.from(gavno).map((el) => +el.innerText); const totalNew = newTotal.reduce( (prevVal, currentVal) => prevVal + currentVal, 0 ); setTotal(totalNew); }; const deleteItem = (event) => { const itemToDelete = event.target.closest(".invoice-details"); console.log(itemToDelete); }; return (

INVOICE

Living Skies Window Tint 160C 16th Street West, Prince Albert, SK, S6V 3V3

Invoice #

BILL TO

SHIP TO

{items.map((item, id) => (
))}
PST: GST/HST: GRAND TOTAL: ${total.toFixed(2)}
); };
